algorithm_technique: Check character set equality and frequency distribution equality using counters.
problem_summary_simple: Check if two strings can be transformed into each other using swaps and character substitutions.
problem_summary_technical: Verify if strings have same length, same character set, and same frequency counts of characters.
key_insights: Operation 1 (swap) means character order doesn't matter, only counts.
Operation 2 (transform) means the set of characters must be the same.
The core conditions are: same length, same character set, and same frequency distribution of characters.
